nodes.bodyText: if getValueTime() returns null will this still work? I've seen inputs where the time was extracted from the receipt as not a real time, e.g. '36:54:47 PM', and then although the field type is set to "time" it returns null for valueTime.
How will that scenario look in the swagger? do you have an example?
Will send to you guys in chat since the example is a personal receipt
Updated to add a null check before parsing, thanks Krista!
